item.title: Oct 9th, 2022
item.description: 01:26 - Let’s try working on a public Logseq graph I’m thinking of publishing my bookmarks and notes here. 01:28 - Let’s begin with the tools I used to publish this site Logseq Logseq Schrodinger Logseq Hugo Template Hugo GitHub Pages 01:35 - However, knowing myself: Clicking menus to export a zip file and then committing to git to publish sounds like a little more friction than I’m willing to overcome daily.
